entry.title: Solana Jumps Double Digits to Reclaim $11
entry.summary: Despite the recent boost, Solana is down almost 20% over the past month as many SOL-based projects migrate to pastures new.

entry.title: Bitcoin Core Dev Loses At Least $3.6 Million in BTC to Hack
entry.summary: Luke Dashjr said his PGP key was compromised, resulting in the theft of over 200 BTC—worth upwards of $3.6 million.

entry.title: Metaverse Tokens ApeCoin, Axie Infinity Ring in New Year With 6% Surge
entry.summary: Metaverse and gaming tokens have started the New Year on a high note, while games giant Square Enix has doubled down on blockchain.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Did SBF Move Money? Man Utd NFTs Under Fire. Eisenberg Arrested!
entry.summary: SBF returns to Twitter, Avraham Eisenberg is busted, and Manchester United gets accused of NFT art plagiarism.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Flat in Final Week of 2022, Solana and Dogecoin Down Bad
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum slid less than 2% in the final week of a brutal year for crypto prices; SOL and DOGE fell much harder.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Denies Moving Alameda-Linked Funds: ‘None of These Are Me’
entry.summary: SBF tweeted for the first time since December 12 to push back against speculation that he moved Alameda funds.

entry.title: Bitcoin Firm Compass Mining Wins $1.5M in Suit Against Dynamics Mining
entry.summary: After a dispute that spilled out onto social media this summer, Compass has emerged victorious—but Dynamics vows to appeal the ruling.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Expected to Plead Not Guilty on FTX Fraud Charges
entry.summary: The FTX founder and former CEO will reportedly enter a not guilty plea to eight charges of fraud from U.S. authorities.

entry.title: FTX Customers Owed $1.9B Ask Court to Keep Their Names Secret
entry.summary: A group of FTX customers from outside the United States doesn't want to be named in the crypto exchange's bankruptcy proceedings.

entry.title: What Is Counterparty? Historical NFTs Built on Bitcoin
entry.summary: Tokenized artwork and collectibles actually predate the Ethereum NFT boom. Here's a look at the Bitcoin-based Counterparty protocol.

entry.title: Dogecoin Plummets 13% Amid Rumors of Ethereum-Like Merge
entry.summary: The volatile meme coin is shedding value as 2022 comes to a close, amid chatter over a potential proof-of-stake transition ahead.

entry.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Buys the Dip, Scoops Up $5.5M in Coinbase Stock
entry.summary: Ark Invest has once again moved to purchase cheap Coinbase stock, adding $5.5 million worth of COIN shares to its ARK Fintech Innovation ETF (ARKF).

entry.title: Bahamas Securities Commission Confirms It Has $3.5B in FTX Assets
entry.summary: The confirmation comes as tensions remain about the Bahamian regulators' role in FTX’s ongoing legal issues.

entry.title: FTX Japan to Refund Customers Starting February 2023
entry.summary: FTX Japan is developing systems to enable customers to recover their stuck assets via local crypto exchange Liquid Japan.

entry.title: Trump NFTs Crater With Daily Sales Down 98% From Peak
entry.summary: Demand for the ex-president’s Polygon NFTs has vanished, with both sales volume and prices falling sharply.

entry.title: Solana Slides Another 16% and Falls Out of Top 20
entry.summary: Once among the most valuable cryptocurrencies on the market, SOL has shed 97% of its value since its peak and is falling fast.

entry.title: Biggest Crypto CEO Exits of 2022
entry.summary: Many major industry executives resigned or were removed as the bear market set in and contagion took hold.

entry.title: Turkey Pushes Ahead With Digital Lira
entry.summary: The country’s central bank has completed the first tests of its CBDC.

entry.title: Alameda-Linked Funds on the Move Again via Coin Mixers
entry.summary: Wallets linked to Sam Bankman-Fried's Alameda Research are swapping and transferring crypto funds, using coin mixers to obscure transactions.

entry.title: The Year in Crypto, 2022 Part 2: Ethereum Merges, Feds Sanction Tornado Cash, FTX Collapses
entry.summary: If the first half of 2022 showed green shoots for the crypto industry, the second half snuffed out optimism of another bull run.

entry.title: China to Roll Out State-Backed Exchange for Digital Collectibles
entry.summary: The state-backed marketplace will serve as a secondary trading platform for what China refers to as digital collectibles.

entry.title: Pega Pool Aims to Make Bitcoin Mining Eco-Friendly With Carbon Offsets
entry.summary: With Bitcoin mining’s fossil fuel use on the rise, the Bitcoin mining pool is on a mission to reduce the industry’s carbon footprint.

entry.title: Coinbase Customers Block Attempts to Move Lawsuit to Arbitration
entry.summary: Coinbase has made significant efforts to keep several different cases limited to arbitration and out of federal courts in recent months.

entry.title: Solana-Based Tokens Tumble as ‘Ethereum Killer’ Continues Slide
entry.summary: The price of Solana's native cryptocurrency fell another 6% on Thursday, pulling other tokens in the ecosystem down with it.

entry.title: Bankrupt Celsius Seeks to Extend Claims Deadline for Burned Users
entry.summary: The move intends to provide Celsius’ account holders with additional time to file potential proofs of claim.

entry.title: 3Commas Admits It Was Source of API Leak That Led to Hacks
entry.summary: After insisting for days that victims had simply fallen for phishing attacks, the platform’s CEO said he is “sorry that this has gotten so far.”

entry.title: Nouns Ethereum NFTs Will Appear in 2023 Rose Parade
entry.summary: Seth Green’s production company built a Nouns-inspired float and costumed characters for next week’s pre-Rose Bowl festivities.

entry.title: US Department of Justice Investigating Massive FTX Hack: Report
entry.summary: An estimated $650 million worth of crypto went missing after FTX declared bankruptcy, and now U.S. authorities are reportedly investigating.

entry.title: Most Impressive NFT Projects of 2022
entry.summary: From goblins to Nouns to penguins to Reddit Snoos, these NFT projects made waves in 2022 amid the speculative noise.

entry.title: Solana Sinks Below $10 for First Time in Nearly Two Years
entry.summary: SOL has dropped a further 29% this month after taking a hard hit amid the FTX collapse, plus Solana’s top NFT projects are moving on.

entry.title: The Year in Crypto, 2022 Part 1: NFTs Peak, Terra Tumbles, Musk Buys Twitter
entry.summary: In our first half recap of the year in crypto, we run back FTX's massive valuation, OpenSea's peak, Terra's collapse, and regulatory talk.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Sells Off Bitcoin for First Time—Then Buys Even More
entry.summary: Michael Saylor’s software company framed the sale as being for “tax benefits,” but its appetite for amassing Bitcoin hasn’t yet waned.

entry.title: Alameda-Linked Addresses Begin Swapping Ethereum, ERC-20 Tokens for Bitcoin
entry.summary: It is currently unclear who was behind the latest transfers from crypto wallets associated with Alameda Research.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Hits New Lows, Plummets 6% in Five Days
entry.summary: America’s largest crypto exchange Coinbase looks to be ending the year on a somber note amid falling revenues and profits.

entry.title: FTX Lawsuit Says Burned Users ‘Should Not Have to Stand in Line’ With Other Creditors
entry.summary: A new lawsuit against the now-bankrupt FTX exchange argues that any assets recovered should be “earmarked solely for customers.”

entry.title: Investors Sue Gemini, Winklevoss Twins Over High-Yield Earn Products
entry.summary: A class-action lawsuit alleges Gemini sold interest-bearing accounts that it failed to register as securities.

entry.title: Mango Markets Attacker Avraham Eisenberg Arrested, Charged With 'Market-Manipulation Offenses'
entry.summary: Eisenberg has been charged with commodities fraud and commodities manipulation for his role in the $110 million Mango Markets exploit.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Argo Blockchain Sells Texas Facility to Galaxy Digital for $65M
entry.summary: In addition to the $65 million sale to Galaxy, Argo is also grabbing a $35 million loan backed by more than 23,000 mining machines.

entry.title: SBF Filing Details $546 Million Purchase of Robinhood Shares
entry.summary: A loan from Alameda Research funded the purchase of shares now sought by BlockFi.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Will Face Judge Who Presided Over Trump, Kevin Spacey
entry.summary: A “no-nonsense” Manhattan judge who has handled a number of high-profile cases will now oversee SBF’s.

entry.title: gm: Zora Looks Beyond NFTs to DAO Creation
entry.summary: Zora sees itself as more than just an NFT marketplace; its next era is about helping people easily launch a DAO. Zora Co-founder Jacob Horne joined Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward to talk competition, the NFT speculative boom and bust, how Zora and Nouns are connected, and why Zora thinks DAOs are the future. Watch Episode 27 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: How Tezos Was Ahead of the Proof-of-Stake Merge: Web Summit 2022
entry.summary: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman talks about how the Tezos blockchain has used a proof-of-stake mechanism since its inception, her admiration for Tendermint, Ethereum and sharding, progressive decentralization, and NFT gaming with Decrypt's Stephen Graves onstage at Web Summit in Lisbon.

entry.title: gm: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce Critiques SEC's Approach to Crypto
entry.summary: SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce has been an outspoken advocate for crypto and a candid critic of her own agency’s approach to regulating crypto markets. In an extensive chat with Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott she discussed FTX, Gary Gensler, DeFi, and the problems with the Howey Test. Don’t miss this conversation for the inside take on the SEC’s thinking on crypto—straight from the source. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: gm: Tezos Co-Founder Kathleen Breitman Sounds Off on FTX Collapse
entry.summary: Tezos co-founder Kathleen Breitman has been in crypto since the beginning and has seen a lot of cycles and failures. She joined Stacy Elliott and Dan Roberts and brought the fire on FTX and Sam Bankman-Fried’s mismanagement, “decentralization theater,” Tezos’s reputation and positioning, crypto sports marketing, and NFTs. Watch Episode 25 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Raising in a Bear Market: Slow Ventures, Volt Capital, Conviction, AngelBlock at 0xpo Summit
entry.summary: Clay Robbins of Slow Ventures, Soona Amhaz of Volt Capital, Sarah Guo of Conviction and formerly Greylock, and Alex Strzesniewski of AngelBlock joined Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Summit in San Francisco on November 3 for an extensive panel on raising venture money even during Crypto Winter.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Bored Ape Yacht Club Wins NFT Project of the Year
entry.summary: Illa Da Producer accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Yuga Labs from presenter Alanna Roazzi-Laforet at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Moonbirds, Azuki, DeGods, and CloneX.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Art Blocks Founder Wins Industry Achievement Award
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder Erick Calderon accepted the industry achievement award from presenter Clara Tsao of Filecoin Foundation at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: BFF Wins Diversity Award
entry.summary: Rachel Weiss and Jackie Courtney accepted the Cryptie for BFF from presenter Rebecca Barkin of Lamina1 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were WomenRise, Boys Club, and The Hug.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Crypto Unicorns Wins Game of the Year
entry.summary: Katrina Wolfe accepted the Cryptie for Crypto Unicorns from presenter Avery Akkineni of Vayner3 at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Stepn, Zed Run, and Blankos Block Party.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Celo Wins Social Impact Award
entry.summary: Marek Olszewski accepted the Cryptie for Celo from presenter Dan Roberts of Decrypt Media at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Ukraine DAO, Dream DAO, Proof of Protest, and Digital Diaspora.

entry.title: The Crypties 2022: Doodles Collab With Shopify Wins Mainstream Award
entry.summary: Shirley Cedeno and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie on behalf of Doodles from presenters Igor Lilic and Gabriela Ramos Lilic of Breakout at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were RTFKT and Nike, Gmoney and Adidas, Tiffany and CryptoPunks, and TIMEpieces.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: People of Crypto Wins Metaverse Event of the Year
entry.summary: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year
entry.summary: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
entry.summary: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.
